first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.skill.tree matches 0.. run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.skill.tree 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.skill.tree=1..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.skill.tree 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.skill.tree=3..}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.skill.tree 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud=1..}] run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud=3..}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud 1
execute unless score @s[tag=sentinel.false] satsu.iron.man.animation.armor matches 1 run function satsu_iron_man_addon:armor_actived/scoreboard_animation_add_and_decrease
execute as @e[tag=sentinel.test] run scoreboard players operation @s grave.ID = @e[type=minecraft:player,sort=nearest] grave.ID
execute unless score @s[tag=!sentinel.false] satsu.iron.man.animation.armor matches 1 run function satsu_iron_man_addon:armor_actived/scoreboard_animation_add_and_decrease
execute unless score @s[tag=sentinel.false] satsu.iron.man.animation.armor matches 1 run function satsu_iron_man_addon:armor_actived/scoreboard_animation_add_and_decrease
execute as @s[tag=sentinel.false] as @e[tag=sentinel] run function satsu_iron_man_addon:ia/swap_sentinels
last_tick_commands: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel.test,distance=0..30] run tag @s add give.sentinel.one
execute as @e[tag=sentinel.test] if score @s grave.ID = @p grave.ID run function satsu_iron_man_addon:ia/swap_sentinels
execute as @e[tag=sentinel.test] if score @s grave.ID = @p grave.ID run kill @s

first_tick_commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.addon.energy.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.energy.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud=3..}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.energy.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud 1

commands: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=0..3] run tag @s add sentinel_nearest
execute unless entity @e[tag=sentinel,distance=0..3] run tag @s remove sentinel_nearest

first_tick_commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.addon.unlock.lock.sentinel.armor 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.unlock.lock.sentinel.armor=3..}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.unlock.lock.sentinel.armor 1

commands: execute as @e[tag=sentinel,limit=2,distance=0..3] run data modify entity @s Owner set value [I; 0, 0, 0, 0]

first_tick_commands: execute as @s run scoreboard players add @s satsu.iron.man.addon.unlock.lock.scan.abilitie 1
execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.unlock.lock.scan.abilitie=3..}] run scoreboard players set @s satsu.iron.man.addon.unlock.lock.scan.abilitie 1

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.scan.enemies=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.scan.enemies

first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.name matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.full.nonamed","color":"#00aaaa"}

conditions.command: execute if entity @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.ark.energy=10000..}] unless score @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded.max.energy matches 0..

first_tick_commands: execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.name matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.low.nonamed","color":"#00aaaa"}
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.name matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.warning.energy.nonamed","color":"#00aaaa"}
execute as @s unless score @s satsu.iron.man.addon.ia.name matches 0.. run title @s actionbar {"translate":"satsu.iron.man.addon.text.ia.overcharged.nonamed","color":"#00aaaa"}

conditions.command: execute if entity @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.armor.ark.energy=10500..}] unless score @s satsu.iron.man.ark.upgraded.max.energy matches 0..
